We help businesses thrive

Service you need, can count on and trust!

Simpar International professionals have provided services to our clients in the Tri-state area for over 10 years. We are committed to providing your company with bottom-line results. Please call us when you need help on any technical issues. Our commitment is to be your one stop provider of Information Technology solutions.

Learn more

Services

Computer/ Workstation Setup

For complete piece of mind we offer a full installation service for computer hardware, software and network equipment. Whether you are buying an entirely new network or just adding PCs or printers.

Network Design & Installation

Simpar International can help you select from this array of new technologies and deploy them to your greatest advantage. Our technical expertise extends from complex IP data networks to advanced infrastructures.

Telecommunications

We offer a wide array of telecommunications systems, from conference room systems, hosted cloud VOIP, PBX, H.323 and more. We are your full service AV provider and can meet the needs of any small to mid size company.

Technical Support

Simpar International offers Remote PC software support that lets us access your PC or server from our Remote Computer Support Team via any Internet, LAN, or phone connection and work on your computer remotely.

Free Technology Audits

That's right. Your in-office consultation is free. Our technicians have an average of 6+ years of experience in the computer repair field, and can sort out your computer problems so that they're working as needed.

Disaster Recovery Planning

A serious security breach, major loss business critical data, or a threat to business continuity can lead not only to critical business damage and loss, but can also undermine the credibility of your IT department.

Staff Training

Our training presentation will instruct your employees on the proper authorized use of your network. It will also define network and computer policies for your company's protection and use.

Virus Removal

It is important to keep your computer data secure and safe. Having an up to date Virus Protection Software is one of the most important responsibilities of safe, trouble free computing.

Wireless Network Design

Whether you need enhancements to an existing wireless network, require a complete network overhaul, or are starting from scratch, our wireless engineers will provide a complete evaluation of your current network environment.

About Us

Our Mission

Simpar International Is Always Available For All Of Your Ongoing IT Network Support, Web Site Design, And Telephone System Support Needs.

24/7 support

Available 24x7 to proactively manage your systems and infrastructure, providing comprehensive solutions using synergistic tools, resources and processes.

Database Design

Simpar International takes the issues that a client might have with data capture and management reporting and makes them as simple as possible.
